changeSet.author: HumphreyHu
changeSet.comment: 新增"用户历史记录"数据库表 (用于账号注销)
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `vika_user_history` ( `id` bigint(20) UNSIGNED NOT NULL COMMENT '主键', `user_id` bigint(20) UNSIGNED NOT NULL COMMENT '用户ID', `user_status` tinyint(2) NOT NULL COMMENT '用户账号状态(1:申请账号注销, 2:撤销账号注销, 3:完成账号注销)', `created_by` bigint(20) UNSIGNED NOT NULL COMMENT '创建者', `updated_by` bigint(20) UNSIGNED NOT NULL COMMENT '更新者', `created_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间', `updated_at` timestamp NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) USING BTREE, KEY `k_user_id`(`user_id`) USING BTREE ) ENGINE = InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET = utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci COMMENT = '用户历史记录表';
